a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

p.strong: Notice: You can access the regular JUHSD homepage here.

span.h3:
At-Home Learning Resources
Resources for School Closures Due to 2020 Coronavirus (COVID-19)
span.p:
During this time, our physical school campuses are closed and we are not able to offer in-person learning experiences. The Jefferson Union School District is offering the learning resource opportunities included on our At-Home Learning webpages.
Resources for Home Learning are organized by:
We will be updating our resources for At-Home Learning throughout the time that our campuses remain closed.
